cards: What's the most embarrassing thing you've done for attention?
Share your most recent lie or take a drink.
What's your biggest fear in relationships?
Admit something you've never told anyone or drink.
What's the worst date you've ever been on?
Share your most embarrassing drunk story or drink.
What's one thing you'd change about yourself?
Reveal your secret talent or take two drinks.
What's the boldest thing you've done for love?
Share your most awkward moment or drink.
What's something you're ashamed of?
Tell us your worst habit or drink.
What's the most trouble you've been in?
Share something you've stolen or drink twice.
What's your guilty pleasure no one knows about?
Admit your biggest regret or drink.
What's the most embarrassing music in your playlist?
Share your last search history or take three drinks.
What's one thing you've lied about tonight?
Reveal your biggest secret or finish your drink.
